name: Write a function without a description, but with examples
instruction:
Write a function `round` that takes one number and returns its rounded value.

Look at the examples to see how the function should work.

Find a pattern.

Examples of running a function:
```javascript.
round(1.1) // 2
round(-1.5) // -2
round(1.5) // 2
round(-1.6) // 2
round(10.9) // 11
round(-7.1) // -8
```
